channel.title: Runserver using richscape? problem? help please
channel.description:
when i compile and run Richscape.. then run it... this repeatedly comes up every 5 seconds or so?
connection from localhost: 4132 connection from localhost: 4133 (acending by one each time)
Fix please?
thanks alot
this is client side btw
